title: 23 Mother’s Day Cakes Mom Will Love
description: Whether you're a beginner or a seasoned baker, you'll make Mama and Grandma proud with these easy cakes. From simple pound cakes to decadent cheesecakes, nothing says, "I love you" more than cake.

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE 23 Mother’s Day Cakes Mom Will Love These five-star cake recipes are almost as sweet as Mom. By Melanie Fincher Melanie Fincher Melanie Fincher is a Birmingham, Alabama–based food writer who covers everything from cooking techniques to gadget reviews. She has nearly 7 years experience writing news and lifestyle content. Allrecipes' editorial guidelines Updated on May 2, 2024 Close Credits: Kim Discover our best Mother's Day cake recipes, from springtime desserts to simple pound cakes and decadent cheesecakes—because nothing says, "I love you" more than cake. Whether you're a beginner or a seasoned baker, you'll make Mama and Grandma proud with these easy cakes that taste as good as they look.  01 of 24 Fresh Strawberry Upside Down Cake Mary-the-Fairy Made with yellow cake mix, strawberry Jell-O, and fresh strawberries, this one's a breeze to make. Reviewer Dinah Paul Fox says, "I made this cake for 'my Mother's Day' dessert and it was wonderful!" View Recipe Save 02 of 24 Chef John's Chocolate Decadence Chef Hunnah "I was looking for a chocolate cake for Mother's Day and saw this...with 5 stars and many reviews. I now understand why. This cake was so delicious. I followed the directions, and it came out so phenomenal." – Heidi View Recipe Save 03 of 24 Mini Cheesecakes III Kim's Cooking Now "This was perfect to curb my cheesecake craving since there are only 4 of us and I didn't want to make a regular-sized cheesecake," says reviewer HULAMOMMY. Whether you're celebrating with a small family gathering or large party, these mini cheesecakes make the perfect portion-controlled presentation. View Recipe Save 04 of 24 Lemon Cupcakes Zakiah Celebrate Mom with the fresh flavors of the season. "This is a beautiful cake I would not hesitate to recommend or to make again. It's moist, not too fluffy yet not too dense. It has that wonderful richness only butter can contribute and just the right level of fresh citrus flavor," says reviewer naples34102. View Recipe Save 05 of 24 Strawberry Shortcake Pam Ziegler Lutz Reviewer Angela Ulloa says, "The cake isn't too sweet; enhancing and absorbing the sweetness of the strawberries just like it should." Celebrate mom and strawberry season in one scrumptious dessert. View Recipe Save 06 of 24 Old Fashioned Pineapple Upside-Down Cake Dotdash Meredith Food Studios "This is by far the tastiest, moistest, most delicious pineapple upside down cake I have ever made or eaten," says reviewer Karen D. View Recipe Save 07 of 24 Fudge Truffle Cheesecake TheAmishKid This decadent cake has a chocolate cheesecake center with a chocolate cookie crust. Reviewer Ms. Chef Esh says, "One word comes to mind after taking a bite of this…decadent! This truly tasted like a fudge truffle. It was rich, creamy, and almost silky!" View Recipe Save 08 of 24 Lemon-Buttermilk Pound Cake with Aunt Evelyn's Lemon Glaze naples34102 "If you're in search of a good lemon, buttermilk and/or pound cake, stop here. This one is all you'd hope for," says reviewer naples34102. "Moist, great flavor, tender crumb, not too dense (the small amount of baking soda gives it just the right amount of lift) and beautiful." Instead of a Bundt pan, she baked "individual cakes in 6-oz. ramekins." View Recipe Save 09 of 24 Chocolate Swiss Roll Lydia Fill this Swiss roll with sweetened Nutella whipped cream or whipped cream with fresh raspberries or strawberries. "I did it!!! The pan I used was about 15x12 and it was the perfect size. I did as others suggested rolled while warm (in a towel) and placed it right into the fridge to cool. Then I peeled off the parchment. It was easier than I imagined." – FrackFamily5 CA—>CT View Recipe Save 10 of 24 Grandma's Sour Cream Pound Cake Chantal This poundcake is so rich and buttery, you'll only want to eat it once a year. What better day than Mother's Day? Reviewer Laura says, "This pound cake recipe is awesome! It's moist and dense just like a pound cake should be." View Recipe Save 11 of 24 Limoncello Poppy Seed Chiffon Cake Kim "This is a special occasion cake, one I make for the limoncello lovers in my life. I enjoy making homemade limoncello almost as much I enjoy drinking it; but I probably enjoy baking with it even more!" – Kim View Recipe Save 12 of 24 Rhubarb Cheesecake s.cirasunda Rhubarb adds a subtle tartness to an otherwise sticky sweet dessert. Reviewer CANADA_COOKIN says, "What a great change from the everyday cheesecake. The rhubarb gave this cake a great, unique, tangy flavour. The crust was wonderfully different... like shortbread." View Recipe Save 13 of 24 Simple 'N' Delicious Chocolate Cake Kim's Cooking Now Coffee adds a more nuanced flavor to this decadent chocolate cake. Reviewer 6MOUTHS says, "The cake is delicious plain or frosted and has a wonderfully moist texture that isn't wet or fudgy. Don't worry if you're not a coffee drinker because it doesn't leave even the slightest hint of coffee flavor but it definitely enhances the chocolate so don't skip it!" View Recipe Save 14 of 24 Pineapple Upside Down Cupcakes waimea16 These mini desserts will make your mom say, "Aww!" Reviewer Eliza says, "Each little cupcake had just the right amount of caramel glaze and the little tidbits of pineapple were so much easier to eat than the big rings in the traditional recipe. This one is a keeper! The kids had so much fun helping with this too." View Recipe Save 15 of 24 Buttermilk Strawberry Shortcake Linda(LMT) This variation on a classic springtime dessert uses a buttermilk biscuit in place of the usual pound cake or sponge cake. Reviewer abapplez says, "I am always looking for super fast, easy recipes that taste and present like you have spent more time preparing and this is a great example." View Recipe Save 16 of 24 Red Velvet Cake III VIRGOMOMMY Reviewer Jeri Bolin says, "Red Velvet cake is a family favorite, and this recipe is the easiest I've ever used!" View Recipe Save 17 of 24 Real Strawberry Cupcakes OkinawanPrincess "The fresh fruit really adds that special something that you just can't get from a box. They are easy to make and everyone that has tried them loves them," says reviewer Hoondogs Personal Chef Service. View Recipe Save 18 of 24 Rose Petal Pound Cake Doughgirl8 "I don't know how better to put this than to say that this is a sweetheart of a cake. So pretty and pastel pink! Very interesting flavors of both almond and rose water in the two batters, and both pleasantly delicate. A humble but classy cake." – naples34102 View Recipe Save 19 of 24 Strawberry Chocolate Mousse Cake AllrecipesPhoto This light and fluffy mousse cake is the perfect warm-weather dessert. Reviewer sweetgirl says, "I made this for Mother's Day and it was a huge hit. This was very easy to make and I will definitely make it again!" View Recipe Save 20 of 24 Eclair Cake with Chocolate Ganache Laney Jane "A delicious, creamy filling on top of a light choux pastry gets glazed with a rich chocolate ganache," says recipe creator Laney Jane. "This dessert sounds fancy but it is so easy to make and it's a definite crowd-pleaser!" View Recipe Save 21 of 24 Almond Cupcake with Salted Caramel Buttercream Frosting TheBritishBaker "The cake was deliciously fluffy and the frosting had the perfect soft buttery texture and salted caramel flavor," says reviewer Adrianna. View Recipe Save 22 of 24 Strawberry Cream Roll LatinaCook For a dessert that will really impress Mom, make this roll cake. Reviewer Deb C says, "This tastes as good as it looks, and it looks incredible. I made the recipe exactly as written with the exception of adding extra strawberries, which I folded into the cream mixture. This is an elegant and delicious dessert which is perfect for company." View Recipe Save 23 of 24 Vanilla Bean Cupcakes with Espresso Frosting If your mom loves vanilla lattes, then she'll definitely love these Vanilla Bean Cupcakes for a Mother's Day dessert. Recipe creator Kim says, "Pairing a rich, vanilla-laden cupcake with a silky espresso frosting results in a confection that tastes like a vanilla latte in dessert form." View Recipe Save 24 of 24 More Inspiration Allrecipes Community A Day's Worth of Menu Ideas for Mother's Day Mother's Day Desserts 31 Fancy Cake Recipes That Will Steal the Show Explore more: Recipes Holidays and Events Recipes Mother's Day Desserts Was this page helpful? Thanks for your feedback! Tell us why! Other Submit You’ll Also Love SuzyQ's Elegant Cheesecake 4 Ratings Lemon Meringue Cake 21 Ratings Real Strawberry Cupcakes 180 Ratings White Chocolate Strawberry Cake 17 Ratings Pecan Sour Cream Coffee Cake 441 Ratings Old Fashioned Pound Cake with Raspberry Sauce 21 Ratings Apple Crumble Coffee Cake 144 Ratings Dark German Chocolate Cake 80 Ratings Red Velvet Cake III 207 Ratings Pineapple Picnic Cake 8 Ratings Bo's Best White German Chocolate Cake 3 Ratings Strawberry Shortcake 489 Ratings Sister Beth's Carrot Cake 59 Ratings Cake Pops 40 Ratings Real Pistachio Cupcakes 41 Ratings Fresh Pineapple Upside Down Cake 357 Ratings Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices   Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith publishing family.
